S

ServerCommand - Class in me.s3ns3iw00.jcommands.type
A Command that only can be used on servers where the command has been registered.
Can be limited for users, roles, channels and categories.
ServerCommand(String, String) - Constructor for class me.s3ns3iw00.jcommands.type.ServerCommand
 
ServerCommandBuilder - Class in me.s3ns3iw00.jcommands.builder
Useful class that makes ServerCommand creations more comfortable
